evidence.claim: Altruistic Home Health utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure and HIPAA-compliant data storage.
The company emphasizes HIPAA compliance in their service offerings, indicating their focus on health data protection.
Integration with EHR systems is highlighted as a key service feature, supporting efficient patient care management.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of using X12 transactions; focus on HHE and EHR integration instead.
